mobile.name: farmer
mobile.long_description: A farmer walks around, looking for something to do.
mobile.description: This farmer is a resident of Stanneg by the Mountains, and as such, is one of the most boring people on earth.

mobile.name: storekeeper
mobile.long_description: A bored storekeeper waits for you to do something.
mobile.description: The bored storekeeper keeps a lazy eye on you as he waits for you to buy something. Whee.

mobile.name: cowgirl
mobile.long_description: A cowgirl stand here ready to defend her horses...
mobile.description: This woman seems ready for anything you might do... she is truly a woman to be reckoned with...

mobile.name: horse
mobile.long_description: A horse does horsely things here.
mobile.description: This horse looks like a nice horse. It looks at you with soft brown eyes and you want to give it a carrot.

mobile.name: farmer's wife
mobile.long_description: A farmer's wife offers you some vegetables.
mobile.description: This woman has many different types of fruits and vegetables for you to buy. She looks bored, though.

mobile.name: aglandiir dragon
mobile.long_description: The Dragon Prince, Aglandiir, sits here looking at you curiously.
mobile.description: Aglandiir is a prince of his kind, and he didn't get where he is today by letting people steal from his horde!

mobile.name: cyclops
mobile.long_description: A Cyclops is here, trying to judge range with no depth perception.
mobile.description: This Cyclops throws rocks real good. With one eye though, hitting the target is another matter. He looks at you and growls as he misses again!

mobile.name: salle woman
mobile.long_description: A woman ignores you completely, so intent is she upon her sword.
mobile.description: She is a stunning woman, all hair and eyes, it seems. Her clothing is of the same tawny brown of her skin and hair. Her blue eyes look at you appraisingly, seemingly to show great intelligence. Her mouth twitches into a sneer...

mobile.name: duwick man
mobile.long_description: A truly immense man laughs at you, and draws his knife!
mobile.description: This has to be one of the biggest men you've ever seen. He is a full seven feet toe to head, and weighs a good three hundred pounds -- mostly on his biceps and pectorals it appears. An ornate scabbard slaps by his side, with the pommel of a silvered dagger sticking out... a tiny weapon for such a large man!

mobile.name: receptionist
mobile.long_description: A receptionist offers you a room.
mobile.description: He looks like a retired farmer now making an honest living in an inn. More power to him!

mobile.name: innkeeper
mobile.long_description: An aged innkeeper greets you as you enter.
mobile.description: He is old and greying, but seems to have been able to keep his mental faculties through the years. A large woolen sweater is wrapped about him for warmth. His blue eyes dance with amusement as he notices your weapons, but he doesn't seem too terribly startled.

mobile.name: hunter
mobile.long_description: A hunter walks through the town streets on his own time.
mobile.description: He looks mean, as if the very personality of the mountains had infected him with hardness. His stride is purposeful, his face weathered, his eyes cold and dark. Others are standing out of his way as he walks on by.

mobile.name: waiter
mobile.long_description: A waiter rushes by, intent on his business.
mobile.description: He looks harried from the way he hastily takes orders and rushes in the back to get food, and to the bar for drinks. He doesn't even spare you a glance as he passes by.

mobile.name: waitress
mobile.long_description: A waitress rushes by, intent on her business.
mobile.description: She looks harried from the way she hastily takes orders and rushes in the back to get food, and to the bar for drinks. She doesn't even spare you a glance as she passes by.

mobile.name: bartender
mobile.long_description: A bartender washes a glass idly here.
mobile.description: He nods, smiles, and asks you what you would like to drink. As you decide, he slowly polishes a glass with an old bar rag. The glass is completely clean, but he polishes it anyway. Go figure.

mobile.name: bandit
mobile.long_description: A bandit springs into action upon seeing you.
mobile.description: Whew! Has this guy ever seen a bath? His face, hands, arms... nearly every bit of him is covered with grime, dust, dirt and decay. His sword is polished and cleaned though...

mobile.name: bandit guard
mobile.long_description: A bandit guard stands at attention here.
mobile.description:
He may be a bandit, but he's no slacker. You wonder who would be able to keep these bandits in line enough to pull a good guard duty...
(boy is this guy DIRTY!!!)

mobile.name: miner worker slave
mobile.long_description: A slave here is mining out a new passageway.
mobile.description: The slave looks up at you with pleading eyes. He wants his freedom. The chains around his ankles are tight, and you wonder if you should set him free, and if you even can.

mobile.name: farmer
mobile.long_description: A farmer walks around, looking for something to do.
mobile.description: This farmer is a resident of Stanneg by the Mountains, and as such, is one of the most boring people on earth.

mobile.name: hunter
mobile.long_description: A hunter walks through the town streets on his own time.
mobile.description: He looks mean, as if the very personality of the mountains had infected him with hardness. His stride is purposeful, his face weathered, his eyes cold and dark. Others are standing out of his way as he walks on by.
